abstract: Indonesian government officially ends search for bodies of victims from AirAsia Flight 8501, which crashed into Java Sea in December 2014, killing all 162 people on board; smaller civilian team will continue its own search operation.
lead_paragraph: A civilian agency will continue searching for the bodies of those who were on Flight 8501, but the armed forces were the mainstay of the operation that found 70 of the 162 people onboard.
snippet: A civilian agency will continue searching for the bodies of those who were on Flight 8501, but the armed forces were the mainstay of the operation that found 70 of the 162 people onboard.

headline.main: Indonesian Military Halts Search for Victims of AirAsia Crash
headline.print_headline: Indonesia: Armed Forces End Jet Search
